Attributes.description: Practical skills for analyzing language using the Python programming language and relevant packages.
Attributes.prereq: Pre-reqs: One of LING 100, LING 101, LING 140, LING 170, LING 200, LING 201, ENGL 330, ENGL 331. (Recommended: LING 201 and CPSC 103 or CPSC 110 (or other programming experience).)
